lead_paragraph: David Ortiz homered twice, passing Hall of Famer Carl Yastrzemski for second place on Boston's career list, and Steven Wright pitched a three-hitter as the Red Sox beat the New York Yankees 5-1 on Sunday night.

headline.print_headline: Ortiz Hits 2 HRs, Wright Pitches Red Sox Past Yankees 5-1
headline.main: Ortiz Hits 2 HRs, Wright Pitches Red Sox Past Yankees 5-1

snippet: David Ortiz homered twice, passing Hall of Famer Carl Yastrzemski for second place on Boston's career list, and Steven Wright pitched a three-hitter as the Red Sox beat the New York Yankees 5-1 on Sunday night....
